pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Inference in Weighted Lindley Distribution // Estimate the parameters of weighted Lindley distribution, and provide some useful results like goodness of fit or confidence interval etc. Ghitany, M., Alqallaf, F., Al-Mutairi, D., Husain, H. (2011) doi:10.1016/j.matcom.2010.11.005. Hyoung-Moon Kim. and Yu-Hyeong Jang. (2020) submitted. Wang, M., Wang, W. (2017) doi:10.1080/03610918.2014.970696.
